historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-270, see notes following § 21-2401.01.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 504 of the Uniform Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction Act. See Vol. 8A, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 21-2405.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: This chapter applies to guardianship and protective proceedings begun on or after [November 25, 2008].

Subchapters I, III, and IV [of this chapter] and §§ 21-2405.01 and 21-2405.02 apply to proceedings begun before [November 25, 2008], regardless of whether a guardianship or protective order has been issued.

title.text: Fiduciary Relations and Persons with Mental Illness. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction; Uniform Act. (Refs & Annos)
